full_text: Poisoning the minds and jeopardising the bodies of so many Republican voters has taken a concerted campaign. Donald Trump is chiefly responsible for it  https://t.co/t3q8o2sFBr

localize.full_text: 共和党の多くの有権者の心を蝕み、体を危険にさらすには、総力を挙げたキャンペーンが必要です。ドナルド・トランプがその最大の責任者です https://t.co/t3q8o2sFBr
